title: CD Projekt Red’s Latest Cyberpunk Apology - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.14.21
description:
Go to http://forhims.com/funnygames to get started today with a FREE online visit!

Go to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code games to get $25 off when you spend $100 or more plus free shipping!

Go to http://burrow.com/games to get $75 off your first order!

Greg and Tim rant about #Cyberpunk2077, #PokemonSnap, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:20 - Housekeeping
The Blessing Show is live! youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack!
The Roper Report   -
00:05:50 - Cyberpunk Explanation, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:11:08 - Can you please make sure to point out this was not them taking ownership? - Best Friends Q:Benjamin Berry
00:21:50 - Pokemon Snap Release Date
00:28:20 - Resident Evil Village Event Incoming
00:31:20 - Super Nintendo World Japan Delayed, James Batchelor GIB
00:34:05 - Elder Scrolls Online Expansion Reveal Delayed
00:36:45 - Riders Republic Delayed
00:40:30 - Best Buy Gamers Club Ends, Tyler Fisher ComicBook.com
00:44:06 -  Ad
00:49:20 - Out today
00:55:07 - Squad Up:BJ Bernardo(XBox) - BJ Bernardo
00:57:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Carolyn Petit

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

leading up to the game's release they shed some light on how uh just how uh there could have been such disparity between the pc and console versions the team also hinted at when the full next-gen versions will be ready despite good reviews on pc the console version of cyberpunk 2077 did not meet the quality standard we wanted to meet i and the entire leadership team are deeply sorry for this and the video this video is me publicly owning up to that iwinski said please don't fault any of our team for what happened they are all incredibly talented and hardworking myself and the board are the final decision makers and it was our call to release the game although believe me we never intended for anything like this to happen i assure you that we will do our best to regain your trust iwinski uh proceeds to delve deep into specific issues the last gen versions of cyberpunk 2070 70 2077. he said the technically complex nature of the game led to some issues in particular he said the quote main

proceeds to delve deep into specific issues the last gen versions of cyberpunk 2070 70 2077. he said the technically complex nature of the game led to some issues in particular he said the quote main corporate for the issues was related to how the team had to constantly improve the in-game streaming system for old gen consoles the hard drive bandwidth of last gen consoles was a constant challenge for the developer the studio's own testing of this streaming technology showed improvements and the studio felt that last gen the last gen edition may be in a good place with the day zero patch he said uh the executive pointed out that issues related to kovid 19 and working from home led to some further complications and problems for cyberpunk 2077 cd projekt red has already released three hot fixes for cyberpunk 2077 but the company isn't stopping there the goal is to fix more bugs and crashes and the next update will arrive within the next 10 days owinski said another more significant
